summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's municipal golf courses; authorizing the Superintendent to enter into a management contract for the operation of the City's municipal golf courses located at Jefferson Park, Jackson Park, West Seattle, and Interbay; authorizing the Superintendent to set golf fees consistent with that agreement and with the Department of Parks and Recreation's 2005-2006 adopted Schedule of Fees and Charges; and authorizing the Department to collect such fees.
